title: Being Here
lyrics:
In it right to the end
Close the show
Turn into sand in Kauai
Living, all it can give
Good to know
Out of the lens in my life



Being here

Means seeing clearly

Being here now

Means calming down

Sincerely



Going well as it can

Who’s to know

Somebody else’s problem

Living, onto the edge

Off the road

Out of the lens, at my life



Being here

Means seeing clearly

Being here now

Means calming down

Sincerely



Seeing the trees for the leaves

And all the grass for the weeds

Going to sleep for the dreams

The dreams



Being here

Means seeing clearly

Being here now

Means calming down

Sincerely

Being here now

Means calming down

Sincerely



Seeing the trees for the leaves

And all the grass for the weeds

Going to sleep for the dreams

The dreams
